feed.title: Little Grand Rapids - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Little Grand Rapids
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then periods of light snow. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
